channel.title: Spawning help
channel.description:
I made a server using pimpscape and I want to put two tryas gaurds in lumbrige.I got the X and y for both but i filled out the auto spawn to put them in but it dosnt work it says.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 200 3227 3217 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras gua rd" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1335) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27)
this is wat i put in autospawn //--NpcID--CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 1200 3227 3217 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras guard spawn = 1200 3227 3220 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras guard
but when i go to log in to see if it works it dosnt let me sign in. if you no why please tell me. thanks in advance

item.title: Spawning help
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Before Tyras GUard, put a 1 so its 0 1 Tyras Guard for both of them.

Ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning help
item.dc:creator: @devindagod devindagod
item.description:
@devindagod wrote:

I made a server using pimpscape and I want to put two tryas gaurds in lumbrige.I got the X and y for both but i filled out the auto spawn to put them in but it dosnt work it says.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “1
200 3227 3217 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras gua
rd”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1335)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:27)

this is wat i put in autospawn
//–NpcID–CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 1200 3227 3217 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras guard
spawn = 1200 3227 3220 1 0 0 0 0 0 Tyras guard

but when i go to log in to see if it works it dosnt let me sign in.
if you no why please tell me.
thanks in advance

Read full topic
